learnMore: Learn more about the latest advancements in farming
seeDiagnosis: See a diagnosis and get a solution
upgradeBenefits: Enjoy all the benefits and explore more possibilities
healthCheckDescription: Take a picture of your crop or upload an image to detect diseases and receive treatment advice.
webImageNotSupported: Image picking is not supported on web in this version.
nameEmailRequired: Name and email cannot be empty
loginToVote: You must be logged in to vote
dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Cropfit Digital Assistant! How can I assist you today?
askOrChoose: Ask your queries or choose from the questions below:
bestCropsSummer: What are the best crops to grow in Haryana during the summer?
protectCropsDiseases: How can I protect my crops from common diseases?
idealIrrigationSystem: What is the ideal irrigation system for my crops?
sustainableFarmingPractices: Can you suggest sustainable farming practices for my farm?
errorProcessingRequest: Sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again.
generateFollowUpQuestions: Generate exactly 4 short, clear follow-up questions based on this query: "%s". Only return the 4 questions in a numbered list format, without any extra text.
agricultureExpert: You are an expert in agriculture. Generate only logical follow-up questions.
title: Ask Community
improve_probability: Improve the probability of receiving the right answer
question_hint: Add a question indicating what's wrong with your crop
description_hint: Describe specialities such as change of leaves, root colour, bugs, tears...
validation_empty: Question and description cannot be empty
